item.title: Implement Newsletter Subscription Using Staticman
item.description: Collecting data in static sites or serverless sites(with POST request) is a hassle because you don’t have a server to receive POST requests and store data. But Staticman is here to help. It will enable users to make POST requests, that will allow you to gather these data. In this article, I am going to tweak Staticman a little to implement newsletter subscription.
